• Added PET and Test Bench progress monitoring to the Active Jobs tab of the Results Browser.
  • Updated the bundled Python to 2.7.17.
    • Note: the Python bundled with OpenMETA now isolates its environment variables from other copies of Python on the system; the bundled OpenMETA Python will ignore environment variables such as PYTHONPATH and PYTHONHOME. To set these environment variables for the OpenMETA Python environment (for example, for a PythonWrapper PET block), prefix the environment variable with OM, for example, OMPYTHONPATH.
  • PET: Support non-float outputs from Test Benches.
  • PET: Don't disallow enum-based design variables.
  • CyPhyPython: Improved error handling.
  • Bugfixes and improvements to PET Refinement in the Visualizer.
  • Updated OpenMETA Visualizer to version 2.1.10.
  • Updated GME to version 20.2.12.
